P

PastCreature - Class in entities
Class that tracks states of all past selves in the single-player co-op game Works for both zombies and player creatures
PastCreature(List<Double>, List<Double>, List<Double>, List<Double>, List<Double>, List<Integer>, List<Integer>, List<Integer>, int, EntityManager) - Constructor for class entities.PastCreature
Constructor takes three Lists, the first of X-axis walking behaviors, the second of Z-axis walkingdw behaviors, and the final of action behaviors so that these actions can be "replayed" where each index is the equivalent turn counter in the game.
pastCreatureAttack() - Method in class entities.EntityManager
This method is called when the past creature is in attack mode.
pastCreatureMeshes - Variable in class entities.PastCreature
 
pastCreatures - Variable in class entities.EntityManager
 
play() - Method in class sound.SoundManager
resumes playing the audio in the game

playerFormerDistanceFromWall - Variable in class entities.Player

playSoundClip(Sound) - Method in class sound.SoundManager
This Method plays a sound clip of the given type specified by Sound and plays that sound clip using the default volume modifier

plays the given track based off of the track number
